title-part.text: HANDLING OF COINS OR OF PAPER CURRENCY OR SIMILAR VALUABLE PAPERS, e.g. TESTING, SORTING BY DENOMINATIONS, COUNTING, DISPENSING, CHANGING OR DEPOSITING

note.note-paragraph:
This suclass covers handling of "coins" or "paper currency" insofar as they carry distinctive value features representative of money or the like.
Informative references: - sorting in general B07C - handling paper sheets in general B65H - counting by weighing G01G - counting of objects in general, i.e. without discriminating of denominations, G06M
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups: G07D13/00 covered by G07D11/00 and subgroup.

title-part.text: dispensing change equal to a sum deposited
dispensing the difference between a sum paid and a sum charged
Sorting a mixed bulk of coins into denominations

reference.text: sorting paper currency G07D11/0084; sorting by coin weight G01G

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/00 and G07F3/04

title-part.text: Sorting coins by means of graded apertures
provided by sieves arranged in series
Sorting coins by means of stepped deflectors

CPC-specific-text.text: the coins being deflected off rails
the coins being diverted by ramps in channels

title-part.text: Apparatus driven under control of coin-sensing elements
Testing specially adapted to determine the identity or genuineness of coins, e.g. for segregating coins which are unacceptable or alien to a currency

reference.text: in combination with apparatus freed or actuated by coins or the like G07F3/00

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/00 to G07F3/027

CPC-specific-text.text: Testing the surface pattern, e.g. relief

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/02 and G07F3/027

title-part.text: Testing the dimensions, e.g. thickness, diameter

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/02 and G07F3/022
Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/02 and G07F3/025

title-part.text: Testing the magnetic or electric properties

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/02 and G07F3/025

title-part.text: Testing the rim, e.g. the milling of the rim

note.note-paragraph: Not complete pending a reclassification. See also groups G07F3/02 and G07F3/027

title-part.text: Testing specially adapted to determine the identity or genuineness of paper currency or similar valuable papers, e.g. for segregating those which are unacceptable or alien to a currency

reference.text: arrangements for verifying the correctness of markings on a record carrier G06K5/00

note.note-paragraph: In this group, groups G07D7/16 to G07D7/20 take precedence over groups G07D7/02 to G07D7/14.
Groups G07D7/00B, G07D7/0046 and G07D7/0093 are not complete pending a reclassification. See also group G07D7/00D

CPC-specific-text.text: Security markings visible to the naked eye

note.note-paragraph: Groups G07D7/0006 to G07D7/002 are not complete pending a reorganisation. See also groups G07D7/124 to G07D7/127

CPC-specific-text.text: Checkcodes, e.g. coded number derived from serial number and value

note.note-paragraph: This group is no longer used for classification of new documents as from January 1st, 2011. The backlog of this group is being continuously reclassified to groups G07D7/00B, G07D7/00F, G07D7/0093

CPC-specific-text.text: Security markings invisible to the naked eye, e.g. "digital watermarks"
involving markings added to a pattern, e.g. interstitial points
involving markings removed from an original pattern
involving markings the properties of which are altered from original properties
involving markings displaced slightly from original positions within a pattern
involving markings which are altered in dimension, e.g. thickened lines
e.g. detecting electric properties of banknotes

title-part.text: using magnetic means, e.g. detection of magnetic imprint,

CPC-specific-text.text: e.g. radiating waves onto the banknote

title-part.text: Visible light, infra-red or ultra violet radiation

note.note-paragraph: Groups G07D7/124 to G07D7/127 are no longer used for the classification of new documents as from March 1, 2008. The backlog of these groups is being continuously reclassified to groups G07D7/0006 to G07D7/002

CPC-specific-text.text: or other mechanical properties, e.g. wear or tear
e.g. recognition of patterns, image processing, comparing to a reference in a memory
preprocessing, e.g. deblurring, averaging, normalisation, rotation
feature extraction, e.g. segmentation, edge detection, Hough transformation
matching a statistical distribution, e.g. of particle sizes orientations
matching with an overlay, e.g. by interference
where a plurality of levels are set

title-part.text: Handling of coins not provided for in the other groups of this subclass

notes-and-warnings.note: Informative references- handling of paper currency G07D11/0021 - counting paper currency G07D11/00K

title-part.text: Hand- or motor-driven devices for counting coins
Devices for stacking or otherwise arranging coins on a support, e.g. apertured plate for use in counting coins

reference.text: apparatus freed or actuated by coins or the like G07F; apparatus freed or actuated by paper currency G07F7/04; complete banking systems G07F19/00;

CPC-specific-text.text: arrangements actuated by a coded-card for receiving or dispensing monies or the like and posting such transactions to existing accounts, e.g. automatic teller machines [ATMs

note.note-paragraph: This group covers constructional or functioning aspects of devices handling paper currency, including of so-called Automatic Teller Machines [ATMs]; other aspects of ATMs, e.g. posting transactions to existing accounts or aspects related to the interaction with users, are covered by group G07F19/00F

CPC-specific-text.text: Secure note containers, e.g. for transport

reference.text: coin boxes G07F9/06; locking means E05B; safes E05G; currency invalidating means E05G1/14

CPC-specific-text.text: incorporating note handling devices within the containers

reference.text: handling paper sheets in general B65H

notes-and-warnings.note: Informative reference- handling paper sheets in general B65H

CPC-specific-text.text: for detection of transport malfunction, e.g. jams, misfeeds
for checking and indicating machine condition, fault detection

reference.text: registering or indicating the working of machines in general G07C3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Means for managing operation, e.g. data handling with apparatus
for servicing, repairing or coping with irregularities, e.g. power failure, vandalism
for tracking or tracing banknotes or cassettes

reference.text: indicating machine condition G07D11/0048; transaction aspects G07F19/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Contents of apparatus, e.g. number of stored banknotes
for transmitting data, e.g. software updates, parameter settings

reference.text: sorting coins G07D3/00 - counting coins G07D9/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Accepting paper currency or other valuables in containers, e.g. in code-marked envelopes

title-part.text: Handling of coins or of paper currency or similar valuable papers, characterised by a combination of mechanisms not covered by a single one of groups G07D1/00-G07D11/00
by downloading test parameters, e.g. remotely
